basics.name: Premium Club Chef
basics.label: Executive Chef
basics.summary: Creative, desire for perfection, dedication to the profession and the art while at the same time effectively balance profitability. Twenty three years professional experience as a dynamic, resourceful and skilled Chef with a proven success record in many dynamic venues and assignments.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Directly responsible for food and labor costs, menu development, recipe creation and standardization...
highlights: Consistently stayed under monthly controllable expense budget.
Adjusted monthly menus to maximize use of seasonal local ingredients and delicacies.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Ensure brand quality, consistency and adherence to standards...
highlights: Designed kitchen and set up pastry department operations.
Developed menu and implemented new items for home stands.

work.name: Company Name
highlights: Developed menu and implemented daily specials.

Consistently adhered to quality expectations and standards.
